author: {'steamid': '76561198026947947', 'num_games_owned': 376, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 629, 'last_played': 1540412520}
review:
Razões para jogar Knights of Pen and Paper +1: 

A primeira de todas é muito clara: KoPaP é um jogo brasileiro (mais especificamente brasiliense), de altíssima qualidade e de reconhecimento mundial. Todo brasileiro que tem interesse por jogos ou quer participar desse mercado deveria dar uma olhada em hits como esse para aprender um pouco mais sobre o cenário de jogos excelente que está se desenvolvendo no Brasil. 

Mas mesmo desconsiderando a razão acima, ainda assim o título chama muita atenção. Um conceito simples e genial: jogar RPG de mesa dentro de um jogo digital. Faz a gente se perguntar porque não pensaram nisso antes, de verdade. A forma como as referências ao universo geek foram apresentadas e como a narrativa se mostra ao jogador trazem os mais puros sentimentos de nostalgia que já senti em algum jogo original. Trazem também mais visibilidade para as maravilhas que são os RPGs de mesa, hoje quase desconhecidos pela juventude.  Engraçado pensar que muitos dos que jogam MMORPG's diariamente nunca se quer encostaram em uma ficha de personagem.

E como só a boa ideia nunca é o suficiente para o sucesso de um título, KoPaP traz um ciclo de gameplay que não só é uma metáfora aos RPGs como também traz um ótimo senso de progressão. Isso em conjunto com uma profunda customização funcional disfarçada de design de interiores, dungeons para serem exploradas, grande variabilidade de inimigos e um gerador simples de missões resultam em horas de diversão e nostalgia.

Então se tem interesse pelo cenário da indústria de jogos brasileira, gosta de jogos com elementos de RPG, curte jogar uma campanha de D&D, quer ver um exemplo de um jogo feito de forma relativamente simples mas com muita profundidade no gameplay e/ou quer simplesmente apoiar os colegas brasilienses que produziram essa joia aqui, Knights of Pen and Paper é o jogo pra você!

author: {'steamid': '76561198162535062', 'num_games_owned': 879, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1569336253}
review: A great game, assuming you're doing something else while you play it. The game is very uninvolved and requires only a few clicks here and there on behalf of the player. The combat is smooth and fluid, the general mechanics feel pretty good, although there is next to no gameplay variety. Another thing worth noting: The mage spell "Deep Freeze" deals what the game calls super-effective damage to literally every enemy

author: {'steamid': '76561198118129032', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 860, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 817, 'last_played': 1516050521}
review: Jogo original, que lembra a essência do que era as mesas de RPG nos anos 90 e 00. Embora com alguns recursos de narrativa, é bem limitado quanto a complexidade de quests, que em muitos casos se resumem a combates rápidos ou repetitivos. Chega a ser possível focar em uma skill por personagem e combar em equipe, não tornando o jogo nada desafiador. Ainda assim me diverti por algumas horas acompanhando a narrativa e buscando combinações entre os heróis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070726032', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2445, 'last_played': 1484266914}
review:
L'idée de base de Knights of Pen and Paper était géniale : vous incarnez non pas des personnages de RPG, mais des gens qui sont en train de jouer à un jeu de rôle papier avec leur MJ autour d'une table. Si les personnages commencent à seulement deux, ils vont entrainer leur entourage dans l'aventure, d'abord le livreur de Pizza, leur petit frère, etc.... Autre idée géniale : la table du MJ est customisable et l'argent gagné dans le jeu vous permet de débloquer des objets qui vous apportent un bonus dans la partie.

Mais derrière cette bonne idée au final ne se cache qu'un RPG à l'ancienne relativement banal : vos personnages ont des aptitudes limitées, le scénario consiste à aller de lieu enrobé de quêtes fedex et si de nouveaux personnages et nouvelles classes sont déblocables, vous allez devoir farmer à mort pour qu'elles aient le niveau de vos autres personnages. 

De toute façon, au bout de quelques heures de jeu on farme grave nos persos en les forçant contre du mob. D'autant plus que pour doter vos personnages d'épées et d'armures, il faudra farmer le forgeron qui au départ à 2 chance sur 3 de foirer votre commande (ce qui est TRES frustrant... l'argent durement gagné dans le jeu finissant la plupart du temps par s'envoler à cause de l'incompétence de celui-ci.)

De plus, l'histoire n'est pas très passionnante, tout juste réhaussé par des petits clins d'oeil par-ci par-là, par des idées marrantes ou des monstres issus de la pop-culture (on se bat contre le Gremlins travesti, on croise Gabe Newell ou les Ghostbusters...)

Alors, bon, ça fait un jeu pas très gourmand en ressource et relativement simple pour jouer tout en regardant des vidéos youtube. Mais il y a mieux, d'autant plus que la version française a été faite avec les pieds : traductions littérales donnant des contre-sens, fautes d'orthographes, oublie de lettres (le MJ dit aux joueurs "pas de riche") voire même une quête qui est totalement en italien suite à un bug. 

De l'amateurisme total !

author: {'steamid': '76561198053644420', 'num_games_owned': 584, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1432727854}

author: {'steamid': '76561198010672112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1724, 'last_played': 1490860527}
review:
Why the hell does this game have so many positive reviews?!

The best part of A actual D&D game, is the feeling you get knowing you can do what ever/go where ever you want. Sky is the limit. Not the case here guys. You are VERY limited.

:PROS:

Cool Idea


:CONS:

You never even use Dice in Knights Of Pen And Paper. Every so often the game will suddenly role for meaningless nonsense, or role when clicking on location to location to determin if an enemy will spawn automatically.

Think NES game with FAR LESS story content. 

You CAN'T interact with the dungeon master at all. 

Your About as close as you can get to being locked into a set path without "technically" being locked into it. You do not make any choices in this game.

There are a bunch of clsasses, which is awesome, but guess what? you can't use 70% of them unless you take the time to unlock them. So you can not even use the classes that you want to when starting out. The unlocking thing would be fine if Knights of pen and paper was A good game and engaging, but it is not. Instead you are left feeling bored/stuck with meaningless grinding, attempting to unlock your preffered class.

Story telling is crap. 

No replay value. 

Not challenging at all.

You never-endingly click on the map doing fetch and escort quests that are so far BEYOND boring they make me want to pull my hair out.

Gold system is flawed. 

Farming for XP is not fun, and feels more like work. Fun is the reason we play video games. 

Could possibly be the shitiest RPG (wannabe) I have ever played. 

Gear crafting is joke. 

Pixel art is not very good.

Music is even worse. 

Contains no creativity. 

No interaction or choices between other characters on table and DM. 

Very little customization

Boring Dialog, and very poorly written. 


:VERDICT:
In no way is it A solo player D&D experience. Or even A decent rpg experience. All you do is click on sh-it with your mouse, hoping that the game will get better, but it never does.

There is nothing special or unique about this game. 
Knights of pen and paper is not worth buying even if it is on sale. 
It is clearly obvious the game is geared towards simpletons that love endless screen tapping cellphone / Tablet garbage.


Do yourself A solid; grab some snacks, invite some friends over, and play some REAL D&D. 

To hell with this epic fail, wannabe, turd pile of A game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091558032', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 745, 'last_played': 1484558703}
review:
Historia loca, divertida y totalmente surrealista donde iremos avanzando mediante misiones, dungeons y bosses.

Si te gustan las batallas por turnos, los graficos pixelados al máximo, las referencias a series, películas, juegos, 'frikadas', y el 'subir niveles' mediante EXP y 'farmeo' de monstruos; este es tu juego!!

A mi me ha encantado.... PERO no tiene STEAM CLOUD!! Por lo demas gratamente sorprendido y 'largo'.



Nabe Gewell y su palanca  😂😂

author: {'steamid': '76561198156890456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1657545343}
review: A lot of salty reviewers saying this isn't D&D dindn't know this was a parody on watching someone play D&D, and it's fun for some reason. I will admit though, once you get around level 25 it does become repetitive, but if you love the grind then this game is perfect and light hearted.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995171991', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1491, 'last_played': 1483890757}
review:
I bought the expansion, I beat the game. And I was very disappointed.

This game pretends to be themed around pen and paper roleplaying, the type that has real choices and such, not just murdering for EXP. What did we get instead? The complete opposite of the pen and paper experience. This is another bad digital RPG that any P&P player would find boring.

So reviewing it for what it really is, a lackluster generic RPG, it's STILL shamefully bad. It tries to make up it's lack of creativity with unending references. Not one of these references were really funny or clever. On top of that, nothing in this came off as original at all.

If I ever had a GM make a campaign that was 100% references and forced us to battle everyone we met? I'd tell him he sucked and then leave. If this was even remotely accurate to P&P games, there'd be an option to seduce every single enemy encounter. You know? SOME choice at least to do something else!

TL;DR
False advertising. Just a really bad RPG made by a bunch of meme kids.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979068807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 238, 'playtime_forever': 1093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1093, 'last_played': 1483614850}
review:
Gioco divertente e ben fatto, l'ho preso in saldi ad un prezzo davvero conveniente. Consigliato a tutti i giocatori di ruolo cartacei, nostalgici vari ed amanti dei dadi in generale. La storia è piuttosto breve ma il titolo si lascia rigiocare senza problemi.
Consiglio: Knights of Pen and Paper può apparire semplice inizialmente, ma prestate molta attenzione a che tipo di strategia volete impostare per il vostro party, una partita di prova è doverosa per comprendere il potenziale delle singole classi e delle abilità passive dei personaggi.

Voto: 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012204476', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1620648256}
review: Jogo muito bom, traz o velho RPG de volta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128427292', 'num_games_owned': 147, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1388, 'last_played': 1558891787}
review:
O jogo é fantástico!!!!

   Knights of Pen and Paper é um jogo em turnos no estilo 'bate e espera' com uma hisótia boa, ela é simples e divertida, tudo que você quer para uma ótima experiência. Os diálogos são engraçados, boas sacadas ao longo da jogatina, que faz com que ela não fique massante.
   Você começa somente com 2 personagens na mesa que tem espaço pra cinco, o jogo possui mais de 15 personagens e 10 classes diferentes, que te da uma certa rejogabilidade.
   No geral, é um jogo ótimo, vale muito a compra ainda mais se estiver em promoções! A Behold Studios (desenvolvedora brasileira) fez um ótimo trabalho nesse jogo!! SÓ VAI!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198100042952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 216, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1473610569}
review:
扑家吧玩的手游
过来支持一下

脑洞非常大的（伪）RPG
说是桌游改版好像又不完全是。。。
很多地方吸取了龙与地下城的要素
剧情战线拉得非常长
手机上修改了还玩了快三天才打通
团长挺逗
游戏里充斥着大量的梗（虽然我几乎都不懂

总之
还是在手机上下一个玩吧
在电脑上专门拿出大块时间玩这个总觉得有点奇怪。。。
支持一下还是可以的

author: {'steamid': '76561198272714200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1502945339}
review:
I really love this game and I want to give it a good review but I just bought this game yesterday and started playing today when all of a sudden I save and quit to play another game. 
When I went to go back to play again, my save file disappeared.

I mean I will still recommend it to my friends but I advise others to save religiously. :/

author: {'steamid': '76561198165280797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482939678}
review: O jogo buga e o ícone de skill e consumir sumiu e os jogadores só fazem ataques básicos e não tem como você arrumar isso, eu tava com hype de jogar mas com esse bug, destrói todas as esperanças do jogo e não tem apoio dos desenvolvedores. tentei ajuda e não consegui.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068450872', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1676, 'last_played': 1491771488}
review: Bon alors je le recommande, mais attention, si vous vous attendez a un RPG papier du genre avec des choix multiples et tout et tout, vous allez être dessus. Au final, ce jeu c'est un rpg comme les autres avec une quête principale et finalement peu de place a l'imagination qu'on peut attendre d'un RPG papier. Mais ca n'en reste pas moins un bon jeu, l'univers est sympatique, les quêtes amusantes, quelques références rigolotes, bref, vous pouvez vous jeter dessus, vous passerez un bon moment :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197973561732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1481425795}
review: kick booty

author: {'steamid': '76561197971451270', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4, 'last_played': 1482746986}
review:
Propuesta muy original. Al principio te encandila rápidamente con su gameplay, las diferentes posibilidades, personajes y demás.

A medida que vas jugando poco a poco te vas desengañando, te queda mal cuerpo por lo que pudo haber sido y no fue. Se vuelve repetitivo hasta la saciedad, acabas abusando de los mismos combos, y todo consiste en un grindeo que acaba perjudicando la experiencia.

Buen juego para echar un ratejo pero no para profundizar en él, ni tan siquiera pasárselo. Lo pongo recomendado ya que en caso de estar barato es una muy buena opción para echar una tarde.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054481798', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 666, 'last_played': 1448802268}
review:
Una sciocchezzuola, ma divertente.
Un gioco di ruolo con combattimento a turni vecchio stampo con grafica pixellosa.
La sua originalità, e quindi il suo perché di esistere, è tutta sui personaggi: non sono maghi, ladri o guerrieri, ma nerd, fratellini, cheerleader che intepretano maghi, ladri o guerrieri.

Tutto sommato diverte anche se presto diventa ripetitivo.
Consigliato se in offerta a pochi soldi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091878565', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1468356559}
review: Fun, but the progression is sometimes confusing. KoPP2 is really better in this way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102684538', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1603225433}
review:
Лучший бюджетный ведьмак.
- Вы ролевик, вы увлекаетесь жанром РПГ, знакомы с настолками? Тогда тащи свой ass сюда.
- Отважные герои, которые убивают всех монстров направо и налево, на самом деле - доставчик пиццы, офисный работник и вервульф. Стоп, вервульф?
- К вам в пати может залесть пришелец, осторожнее. Говорят на 1д20 ему всегда выпадает 20. 
- Тут есть крутые классы, рыцарь, бард, жнец и ниндзя в том числе. И нет, рыцарь не сдохнет от кролика-убийцы (МОНТИПАЙТООООООН)
- Кул шутеечки.

10 гиков из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998119247', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 1254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1254, 'last_played': 1482257705}
review:
The game started quite nice. Humor was pretty good, gameplay was quite a chilling experience. Bu as soon as 3 hours passed, it got so repetitive, that I had to force myself to go through with the story. 
Combat mechanics and character development are heavily underdeveloped here, and considering that's basically 70% of the game... well, that's bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127636129', 'num_games_owned': 980, 'num_reviews': 130, 'playtime_forever': 1061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1061, 'last_played': 1482233019}
review:
It was fun for like 2-3 hours, then becomes very repetitive.

This game did very well at mimicking the tabletop RPG feeling. With the pixel art style and humors in story it brings you back to 80's when you sit with friends and roll some dice. Gameplay is quite casual and easy to pick up when you've got some time to kill.

You can create a 5 members party, every member only have 4 skills, (some of them are passive skills) and there's no positioning. So there's really not much space for tactics, you'd probably be using the same way against all types of enemies. You can create a new member and exchange someone in your party to have some variety. But trying to level  up that guy is another long way to go. There are only limited amount of quests to do, after completing them all you can do is battle with some EXP/gold efficient monsters again and again.

I stopped playing when find myself stuck at a boss and have to farm some money. To me, Knights of Pen and Paper = RPG in a nutshell. It shows me what I like and dislike in RPGs, without having all those fancy graphics, cut scenes, complex battle systems, large amounts of items. And I actually like this style, if you let me pick a game to play between Knights of Pen and Paper and Final Fantasy INSERT YOUR FAVORITE NUMBER, I'd probably still choose this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255036080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 2543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 34, 'playtime_at_review': 1823, 'last_played': 1710807389}
review: Nossa esse jogo é sensacional!!! A antiga versão para smartphones não chega aos pés do que esse jogo se tornou. Fechei a história completa, com todas as quests em 30hrs de jogo. Vou terminá-lo mais uma vez para fazer 100% das conquistas. De verdade, vale cada centavo investido. (A próposito, corrigiram o bug dos saves que o pessoal andou comentando!).

author: {'steamid': '76561198183653149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1480941396}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198008136932', 'num_games_owned': 1185, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1628397289}
review:
I played a lot on my phone and I just found out the PC version, so I bought it for cheap. It's really good, you can get it for cheap and have a lot of fun, it's like a casual D&D RPG with a lot of pixel art.
I have 2 complains about this game:

-It doesnt have any hotkeys for actions, so you must use your mouse for nearly everything; keep in mind that this game was made for iOS first, so most of the UI is designed for touchscreens.
-The game doesn't limit your framerate, so this game runs at like 1500fps, making your CPU veeery hot for no reason. I used Nvidia Inspector to limit the framerate because the normal Nvidia Driver didn't do anything.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047994164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2390, 'last_played': 1480438868}
review:
Jogo muito bem feito e foi desenvolvido por brasileiros, o que dá muito orgulho de gastar e ajudar de alguma forma os criadores desse jogo nacional.
As referências são diversas a cultura popular, desde citações bem diretas quanto aquelas que podem passar despercebidas como o cenário da praia.
Os diálogos são engraçados e você se diverte enquanto avança no jogo, não percebendo que está preso a mais tempo do que imaginava no jogo.

Não só vale a pena comprar o jogo pelo seu conteúdo como também para dar uma força aos profissionais br.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025270592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1480200037}
review:
ios로 엄청 오랜 시간동안 플레이했었는데, 너무 재미있게 플레이해서 스팀 버젼 한글패치의 존재를 듣고 구매했습니다.
태이블알피지이지만, 중간중간에 있는 개그 요소들이 많아서 정말 재미있게 플레이 했습니다. 게임 자체가 옛날 알피지를 패러디한 느낌이 적지 않아서 레벨 노가다 등 지루한 부분이 약간 있긴하지만 알피지 게임을 좋아하시는 분이라면 정말 재미있게 즐기실 수 있을것 같습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003320055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1539417343}
review: 如果你喜歡MUG或是紙上RPG，我想這款遊戲不會讓你失望。多樣的職業與技能設定，感覺永遠攻略不完的任務選擇，配合說書人的語音與喜愛的夥伴踏上旅程吧！至於是踐踏惡龍、拯救公主，還是四處拔刀相助刀子卻拔不出來，就要看個人努力與智慧了。以一款RPG遊戲來說，這款遊戲沒有太多可以挑剔的部分了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031086866', 'num_games_owned': 1969, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1571799962}

review: The best way to play Dungeons and Dragons if you have no friends!  With a plot deep enough for a single D&D session, and a large amount of customization options, this game has a surprising amount of replayability.  Whether your the pizza delivery guy delivering sneak attacks, or a grandma in a barbaric rage, this game will keep you chuckling and playing for enough time to make it worth it's cost.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006819934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 968, 'last_played': 1480046321}
review:
Decent little timesink, of particular note if you're into tabletop RPGs.
Can't recommend it for the mechanical gameplay, but otherwise it's a well realised vision of old-school RPG and old-school RPG accessories.


Combat gets quite repetitive quite quickly (your abilities don't fundamentally change beyond rank 1, besides a couple of one-time-buy items), but the plot itself is fairly entertaining and gets ridiculously meta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157172390', 'num_games_owned': 1217, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 866, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 866, 'last_played': 1479935882}
review:
O que dizer de um jogo dentro de um jogo? 

Se vc nasceu antes ou no inicio da década de 90 vai perceber grandes referencias a cultura pop da época, isso por si só já garante uma diversão enorme, junte isso ao fato de vc controlar jogadores que estão jogando uma partida de Calabouços e Dragões (D&D) e vc terá um jogo perfeito para o nerd que vc é

author: {'steamid': '76561198038980985', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 729, 'last_played': 1506704353}
review:
Nach 12 Stunden haben wir das Spiel fast zu Ende, möchten jedoch es nicht wahr haben.
Vorab, dass Spiel ist eigentlich ein Mobilgame und dementsprechend sollte man nicht die höchste Anforderung in der Qualität haben. Die Story ist sehr unterhaltsam und wenn man mit mehreren Leuten die verschiedenen Sprechrollen verteilt, hat man noch mehr Spaß als man denkt. Wir lachen über die Unmenge der Easter-Eggs und haben die 12 Stunden am Stück gespielt. Wir würden das Spiel glatt wieder kaufen, freuen uns aber auch schon auf den zweiten Teil.

Kurzfassung:
Grafik 3/5 (wenn man weiss was einen erwartet 4/5)
Sound 4/5 (bleibt im Ohr)
Story 5/5 (sehr gelungen)
Easter-Eggs 10/5 (unbeschreiblich unterhaltsam)

author: {'steamid': '76561198046582520', 'num_games_owned': 655, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1273, 'last_played': 1479758532}
review:
为了全成就通关了两次 感到自己浪费了人生
游戏的全部体验还不如社区里一张同人图吸引人
很多角色的特性在游戏中几乎毫无用处 而职业技能设计和蓝耗的提升让几个职业在二周目既没有伤害也没有生存

装备和消耗品看似数目庞大功能齐全 但是大多数时候完全没有用 
装备/饰品只到40级 附带的属性还不是很多人用得上的
（不得不吐槽房间里的零食和饮料居然各有一个是持续时间比其他都短的 简直逼死强迫症

说到房间又不得不说说可以购买的各种家具 看着好像强化属性 然而仔细想想加那么几点只有游戏前期有意义
结果还不如全系列增加零食/饮料持续时间的有用

剧情[spoiler] 到boss穿越还看得过去 然而之后不知道是不是为了强行让G胖出演救世主 整个剧情让人毫无头绪[/spoiler]
完全就是去哪里 杀几个 拿多少 交给谁 （还有万恶的50次地城成就 why?！
而厨房作为隐藏boss魄力完全不足（其实游戏里大多数boss几乎和小兵没有什么决定性的区别
（老实说二周目有着aoe的杂兵比单个boss可怕多了
场景倒是处处充满了捏他 还有各种敌人的像素图非常精良可以说是游戏最大的亮点了

二周目敌人属性急剧上升 即使开修改器把技能改到500（这里说的还是猎人和蛮子的被动加攻击 其他任何耗蓝的技能提升到500是没可能有人有这个MP上限来用的）仍然不能秒 
面对几千的hp而你的攻击只能造成几十伤害
玩家极端缺乏aoe （猎人是唯一的良心职业 然而被动剥夺了所有先攻可能性
不知道这么设定二周目的乐趣在哪里

如果你想玩王道剧情rpg 对不起这作的剧情实在严肃不起来
如果想要像暗黑刷刷刷 对不起掉落是在太垃圾（各种剧情boss就给你掉个1级道具 没卵用不说还占格子
如果想要角色养成 对不起这游戏的养成几乎毫无成就感
这个游戏充满了重复劳动 越玩下去就越感到空虚 直到最后刚开始的新鲜感消失殆尽
作为pc玩家你们实在有太多更好的选择了

author: {'steamid': '76561198036939460', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1683310951}
review: I really like this game, it's genuinely a fun and simple tactical RPG, but after a few hours it became really tiresome. I wish it was more robust, more complex. I wish it had more varied locations, way more frequent epic boss fights. There's great humor in it, but it needs a lot more dialogue or even dialogue choices. Overall it's a rather simple representation of a Dungeons & Dragons tabletop game & it is really fun, but really becomes a chore after a while. I'm hoping the sequel fixed some of my complaints. Despite its shortcomings I'll recommend it because it's well priced, simple, but fun, for a while at least.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020528104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1408260891}
review: Great mobile game.  Too repetitive for a PC game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026468921', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 928, 'last_played': 1527406573}
review:
Le jeu est très joli, et l'idée de base interessante, mais au final très répétitif. Je le trouve un peu cher vu sa simplicité. On finit par avoir l'impression de tuer des monstres a la chaîne, en répétant toujours le même pattern d'attaques. De plus, comme la table est toujours au centre de l'écran, on pas l'impression de voyager rééllement, ce qui est a mes yeux le coeur d'un RPG. 

Je le conseille malgré tout si il est soldé pour pas cher, histoire de s'amuser quelques heures.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210145520', 'num_games_owned': 724, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1476168647}

author: {'steamid': '76561198092567484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1470958143}
review:
I like this game. 
It's a good game. 

I've purchased this on mobile and on Steam and can't get enough of it. 

I wish there was cross-save support between mobile and Steam but it's cool. 
It doesn't hurt my love for the game. 

It's more on the simple side of things as far as RPGs go but that's the point; it's a fun love letter written to fans of RPGs that want to play a quirky and very self-aware game. 

8.75/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198030208468', 'num_games_owned': 691, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1352, 'last_played': 1478310187}
review:
Fun concept, bad execution.  The sequel is more recommended.  There are just TONS of better indie RPGs on Steam, that are more stable and more appropriately priced.

[i]*Edit - After spending a bit more time with Knights of Pen & Paper 2, I can honestly say that it is a superior product in every way shape and form.  All of the things that were promising and intriguing about the original, just not an awful pile of badly ported mobile garbage.  Skip this game and please go buy the sequel - it's fantastic.[/i]

Nothing but cons to list here:

[list]

[*]Unstable and buggy port, my game was even missing a bunch of the dialogue.

[*]Poorly written dialogue, confusing and nonsensical story.

[*]Wide array of classes and items, that are almost all entirely useless due to lack of necessity/context in which to use them, and complete inability to level alternative classes once you reach mid or end-game (beyond an incredibly long and boring grind, repeating the same fights over and over for hours on end).

[*]End-game is an equally long and boring grind, money is [i]extremely[/i] hard to come by, since the original (mobile) version of the game encouraged you to pay cash for gold - The disparity was never fixed when porting to PC.

[*]The price is absurd.  The port is so badly done, that there is zero justification for the seven dollar price increase.  The $4.99 DLC is a slap in the face for the amount of content received.  Easily should have been a $2.99 game w/ $0.99 DLC.

[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198079286568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 1051, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1051, 'last_played': 1476664851}

author: {'steamid': '76561197992438116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 497, 'playtime_forever': 1469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1469, 'last_played': 1477997767}
review: Si vous êtes nostalgique des vieux RPG en 2D, ce jeu est fait pour vous. Les graphismes sont sympathiques, colorés et le jeu est plein d'humour. La progression du groupe est assez bien faite et la difficulté est progressive. Il y a juste le dernier donjon où j'ai eu du mal à m'en sortir sinon très bien. La durée de vie est très bonne en plus pour ce genre de jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316548417', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1575817605}
review:
I have played this game for under an hour and I can already recommend it for those, who likes games that are easy to go to and from. Quests are quickly finished and you can basically leave game anytime. A big fan of the DnD vibe and how you set the difficulty by your own doings. You want harder battles? Fight stronger monsters. Want tougher quests? Go to a higher level place. It's easy to understand, even for people who doesn't have english as their first language.
It might start out confusing for people who aren't familiar with the DnD system, but it is so easily learned.

For now, I have no cons. Maybe the soundtrack could be more colourful but I think it is fitting as it is. The art style is cute and characters have funny comments up their sleeve to keep you intertained. DM is wellspoken too!
I can't wait to get deeper into this game and explore more of its somewhat troubled world.
Definitely worth my money!

author: {'steamid': '76561198064153655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 280, 'playtime_forever': 1213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1008, 'last_played': 1663060663}
review:
What an adventure I had while "sitting down."! Hahahahaha. I did not expect this much from this game.

+) It doesn't sound simple as it does in the trailer. It's not just sitting down and reading what master says.
+) A lot of monsters, dungeons and campaign quests. I didn't actually count them but it felt like they had more than Diablo 3.
+) Music was okay.
+) Effects were noticable. "Why? What's going on?" You ask that and then you'll find answer to your question because of the effect.
+) Rolling dice will not be that much of a problem once you buy dices at the shop.
+) You don't have to grind much since there are going to be a ton of side quests and such to give you xp and gold.

-) I don't really find rolling dice thing while traveling a good idea. They should just made that part fast since they make us go here and there, back and forth a lot.
-) You also have to spend a little amount of money as you travel and that was kind of irritating.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034718740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 681, 'last_played': 1475866303}

author: {'steamid': '76561198015233080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1475324071}
review:
Als Rollenspieler einen Rollenspieltitel über Rollenspiele zu finden ist natürlich interessant und die Idee ist durchaus witzig, also habe ich mir Knights of Pen und Paper zugelegt.

Der Einstieg ist einfach, das Spiel mit Retrografik durchaus nett gemacht. Dazu kommen einige Rollenspiel- und Nerdwitze die durchaus lustig sind. Im Anfang ist es nett. Man sammelt EP um zu steigern, stattet seine Räume aus und erlebt kleine Queste. Mehr als das ist es aber nicht. Denn jedes Quest läuft auf das Gleiche hinaus: Gehe hier oder dorthin, töte ein paar Monster und komm zurück. Mal um etwas zu sammeln, mal um jemanden zu beschützen. Die Charaktere sind simpel. Es gibt jeweils vier Fertigkeiten pro Charaktertypus, die man steigern kann, dazu kann man noch Waffen, Gegenstände und Artefakte sammeln, kaufen oder herstellen.
Im Endeffekt, bleibt es stets beim gleichen, bei einer nicht gerade besonders einfallsreichen Hintergrundgeschichte. Wenn man das Spiel wie ich bei Humble Bundle im Set kauft, mag es durchaus interessant sein, aber 10 Euro ist es nicht wert. Es ist auch keine 5 Euro Wert, denn das ganze Spiel wird schnell langweilig.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987731882', 'num_games_owned': 595, 'num_reviews': 516, 'playtime_forever': 4165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4165, 'last_played': 1474590200}
review:
Played this alittle on the mobile tablet quite long ago,
seeing its on discount on Steam,
thought I'll give it another go.

The game does look better on a smaller screen,
pixel art ain't pretty.
Some of the small details and animations in the background looks intriguing.

From start to mid-levels, the game is interesting,
much to consider, which party members to decide, paths to attain achievements.
Some of the small jokes  may  seem funny for some.

When you had setup the proper lineup to use,
the game becomes a clicker game,
same attacks and spells, every battle, only difference is whom had the initiatives.
Repetative actions till the end.

Loots from battles are off,
a battle of 7 hard enemies with a party of 50s,
the reward is 1 coin low level items.
Makes me wonder ' was it worth it '.

Watching the horse gallop back and fro the map, can get dull and boring.

The game have some serious issues in saving achievements.
As many had mentioned in the forums, several achievements are broken.
Had to go through 2 restarts, 5 playthroughs to finally trigger all the achievements.


Overall.

The game is playable.
Interesting to start, a drag till the end.
Process for achievement is a tough one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013723081', 'num_games_owned': 1047, 'num_reviews': 365, 'playtime_forever': 1639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1639, 'last_played': 1469496678}
review:
A rpg that depict several "players" sitting at a table. This simulates the old table-top rpgs, including a DM, or dungeon master to those who never played table top rpgs. Considering i used to play these type of rpg's with my real life friends in the olden days of my life, this game reminds me of that.

Also, many many easter eggs from D@D jokes to many other ones mixed into the game...

I recommend it for nostalgia value and how it reminds me of my youthful days of table top rgp's.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020049439', 'num_games_owned': 2603, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 2261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2159, 'last_played': 1473791426}
review:
Juego simple y sencillote que se inspira en las partidas de rol de mesa y apela directamente a la nostalgia  de los jugadores veteranos y a la curiosidad de los mas novatos. 

La premisa del juego no podia ser mas sencilla. Reproducir una partida de rol de mesa con los amigotes, plagada de guiños y chascarillos sobre el rol, la fantasia y el mundo de los videojuegos... al mismo tiempo que nos enfrentamos a muchos combates y todos los topicos del genero que a uno se le puedan ocurrir. 

Todo con pixelado muy retro y una jugabilidad muy vieja escuela. 

Las primeras horas del juego son un vicio, la verdad. Con una jugabilidad endiablada y una simpleza que atraera a muchos aficionados al rol, vamos a ir equipando y mejorando a nuesto grupo, subiendo de nivel y viajando de escenario en escenario, combate tras combate, turno tras turno.  

Es de esos juegos que siendo muy simple, al fin y al cabo se hizo para moviles, da de pleno en la diana, consigue que todas la piezas encajen y consigue ser muy divertido... al principio. 

A la larga abusa demasiado de la misma formula y termina por hacerse repetitivo y algo cansino. Y la desastrosa y machacona banda sonora de mercadillo no ayuda, acabas hasta los cojones de ella. 

Una pena que no hayan sabido, o querido, introducir mas variedad y dinamismo a la parte final del juego. Al final acabas con ganas de acabarlo de una vez y ponerte con otra cosa. 

Juego menor y simpatico, ideal para pasar la horas muertas si uno no es muy exigente y tiene paciencia. Recomendable sobre todo a los aficionados al rol con tiempo que gastar entre juego y juego. 


6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198061343464', 'num_games_owned': 253, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 421, 'last_played': 1490019385}
review:
Ich habe mir Knights of Pen and Paper 1+2 (alle DLC'S, Deluxe Edition etc) geholt weil es gerade günstiger Angeboten war zum Zeitpunkt meines kaufes. Das Spielprinzip hört sich wenn man es noch nicht selbst gespielt hat Spaßig an.. man erwartet eine große Anzahl an Quests die abwechslungsreich sind und viel Abwechslung. Wenn man dann aber das Spiel startet erkennt man die Realität.. und die lautet - das Spiel ist EXTREM monoton. Jede Quest die ich bis jetzt machen durfte bestand aus "Kille eine X Anzahl von Monstern".. entweder man muss 30-40 Monster killen um dann 20 (!) Karotten zu sammeln, oder man killt angreifende Monster um jemanden zu eskortieren, oder man killt sie um ein höheres Level zu erreichen.. nur um dann wieder ein weiteres Monster töten zu können für das man sonst zu schwach gewesen wäre.
Mit anderen Worten.. das Spiel besteht aus 90% daraus, das ihr wie bekloppt auf irgendwelche Monster eindrescht bis euch eure Hände weh tun. Die Charaktere erzähln immer wieder die selben Sprüche, es gibt kaum Abwechslung und es ist nicht wirklich Spaßig da sich durchzukämpfen. Ich hatte es beim Spielen sogar oft das ich dachte "boar ne, nicht schon wieder X von Monster Y killen.. das nervt..das is mir zu monoton ich beende das Game jetzt". Es ist Monoton, die Hintergrundmusik geht einem aufn Keks (zu Beginn sagt ein NPC sogar aus Spaß das ihm die Hintergrundmusik auf den Keks geht! und ja..das tut sie..extrem!) und die ganzen Mechaniken sind ziemlich Mies gelöst. Es gibt keinerlei Hotkeys um Attacken schneller auszuwählen und das macht die Kämpfe mit einem Laptop (Touchpad) zur Qual..

Kurz gesagt: Wenn ihr Monotone Nervige Musik mögt, ihr ein Fetisch habt der Beeinhaltet Stundenlang auf Wehrlose Monster einzudreschen, und von Punkt A nach B zu laufen..nur um dann erneut auf Monster einzudreschen.. Dann.. ja dann könnte dieses Spiel etwas für euch sein. Wenn ihr Abwechslungsreiches Gameplay wollt, solltet ihr dieses Spiel nicht kaufen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025050975', 'num_games_owned': 1617, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1472916354}
review:
Interesting idea: you play as pen-and-paper roleplayers, using every stereotype a bad GM can throw at you: cringeworthy story, funny-sounding remarks and lots of combat. If this sounds bad, you either have not played a pen-and-paper RPG, or you were lucky enough to have exceptional GMs. :)

If the game could be completed in 5-8 hours, I would recommend it as great and funny satire. However, it is very padded out: at 14 hours, I was close to finish it (I guess), but should have to level up characters or grind for more equipment, and I said, enough is enough.

review:
Простенькая и весёленькая походовая RPG.

D&D классы, непритязательная графика, море врагов, шопинг, гринд и  постмодерн на марше прилагается. Цели как таковой особой нет, так как протагонисты сидят за игровым столом — нужно завалить всех. Ибо сама игра как таковая и есть цель! Эмулятор настолки-гриндилки.

Всё это в лучшем объёме можно найти и в более современной [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198084019881/recommended/310060/]Knights of Pen and Paper 2[/url].

author: {'steamid': '76561198091098497', 'num_games_owned': 6220, 'num_reviews': 390, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1419518719}

author: {'steamid': '76561198050591081', 'num_games_owned': 248, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 748, 'last_played': 1524795888}
review:
A fun little twist on the typical computer RPG, where you are both the DM and the players.  It does get a bit grindy, and there's little to no storyline to speak of, but I have yet to see another RPG-like game that incorporates the meta concept at all, let alone as well as this one does.  The concept is interesting, and while combat does get repetitive and you end up doing a lot of gold-farming, the tongue-in-cheek dialogue and easter eggs help keep it interesting.

This is, admittedly, the kind of game that's best played in short bursts rather than long sessions, but if you remember the days of 8-bit games and wonder what computerized D&D could have been like back then... this isn't a perfect approximation, but it's a fun little game that's worth a try, particularly if you can get it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970602587', 'num_games_owned': 6364, 'num_reviews': 3660, 'playtime_forever': 517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 517, 'last_played': 1471325394}
review:
https://youtu.be/2dkThn8lc5U

Built upon the 'game within a game' concept, the player creates players who play the game while they play the game of managing the players.

Many classic tabletop RPG tropes are highlighted here with awkward adventures, illogical random encounters and McGuffins as far as the eye can see.  Having been ported from mobile devices the pacing and flow of the game still has some of the feel from the original versions which can drag the experience down.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960522295', 'num_games_owned': 2188, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1470916099}
review:
Prima di leggere la recensione (recensione?????) non guardate le mie ore di gioco perchè il gioco l'ho completato ben 2 volte ma su ipad, ma credo che superino abbondantemente le 10/12 ore se si leggono tutti i dialoghi

----------------------------

Un classico gioco D&D con grafica retrò veramente ben fatto, con un'ottima trama rigorosamente in Italiano. Una storia piacevole da giocare sopratutto nel finale quando si incontrerà il mitico... il mitico.... il mitico..... vabbè non lo dico,  a voi il gusto di scoprirlo.

Il gioco è abbastanza divertente con una trama mai noiosa, abbastanza facile da finire e longevo quanto basta, e con molti mostri e personaggi da scoprire e sbloccare, nemmeno troppo noioso nei combattimenti anche se spesso i mostri si somigliano troppo

Il gioco è longevo quanto basta ma esprime il suo meglio nella versione iOS per Ipad, su Steam l'uso del mouse per quanto piacevole risulta troppo lento rispetto alle dita

Consiglio l'acquisto in quanlche bundle come ho fatto io, soprattutto per chi come me ha oltre i 40 anni ed è attirato dalla sua grafica retrò, anzi se potete prendetelo su Ipad che è meglio!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198071234283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1585, 'last_played': 1693351393}
review:
Knights of Pen and Paper +1
Para quem sente saudade de um RPG de mesa e toda aquela algazarra e diversão, a beholdstudios desenvolveu esse maravilhoso jogo pixelado!
Entre em um mundo narrado de RPG, veja confusão durante o jogo, decepção do Mestre ao ver seus boss sendo derrotados facilmente. Se divirta com referencias de filmes, livros, outros games e histórias.

Knights of Pen and Paper +1, é um jogo multiplataforma, disponível para Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Android e iOS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000524957', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 1101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1101, 'last_played': 1470518192}
review: This is basically a Western take on the JRPG formula with everything that makes a JRPG worth playing carefully removed. Your characters are blank slates, the cut scenes are static character portraits, the story is nerd "humor" (Nabe Gewell needs his Magic Crowbar LOLOLOLOLOL!!!1111), there are no locations to explore, the battle system is incredibly tedious and the central design philosophy of the game is based around mindless grinding.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063139564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1468779534}
review:
This game is really great.

The story line is funny and there's plenty of eastereggs to find.
The concept of gaining gold to buy more or new party members is fun and the fact that the gold can be used for items that change the status effects in the game (the game that they play) is really neat.
And the meta. This game really uses the whole meta concept so nicely, that I haven't played another game that does is quite this well.

Theres plenty of replayability, since you unlock more characters as you play and there's those nice achievements to get, from playing with different charanter setups. Some of the achievements are actually quite hard to do, which just makes it more enjoyable.

The game can get quite repetative and combat can drag out a little, so it becomes more of a grind than a fun experience. But for me the promise of what happens when you get to the next part of the story is enough to get me through it. It you really hate repeating the same pattern over and over again in order to win fights, then I would not recommend playing this game.

This game does deliver what it promises though.
8/10 since the grind does drag it down a little

author: {'steamid': '76561198022908365', 'num_games_owned': 344, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1598275526}

review: I think Knights of Pen and Paper is worth playing. I haven't played this kind of RPG game before - with great pixel graphics and really interesting gameplay. Maybe at times there is too much grinding but if you are not scared of that, get it and play it. Also it's not really long, if you want to only finish it, but there are plenty of things that is making you to play this game again and again. I really enjoyed this game and since there is second Knights of Pen and Paper I will be sure to grab it and have fun with it one day. It was really relaxing time I spend playing this game.

review: Fantastic! The engaging battle system in Knights of Pen and Paper is a major draw that keeps me coming back for more. The abundance of references from other notable titles injects a refreshing dose of excitement, preventing any chance of boredom. The character dialogues are cleverly crafted, adding an extra layer of enjoyment. I genuinely hope that this game doesn't fade away, and I eagerly anticipate future updates from the developers to keep the experience alive and thriving.

review: Surprisingly addictive... author: {'steamid': '76561198163263795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1468189897}
review: Very simple game of D&D pixalated. You start off with 2 characters and you have to buy more character/seats (10, 80, 125 coins). Do go to the store and buy some exp bonus and the other store for attack bonus. The game is not really hard, but it is more of choose how many/powerful your enemies are. Choose to do side quests or explore the other areas. Just becareful of not going to the areas that are +5 level above yours or the battle will take a while. Other than that... I enjoy this game. If this game is over your price limit, get it on sale or bundled. You will enjoy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022712589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1223, 'last_played': 1430514683}
review:
Ein schönes Spiel! In der Art habe ich bislang noch nichts gespielt.

Positiv:
- Motivierender Spielverlauf
- hübsche Retrografik
- Spielfortschritt selbst bestimmbar durch "Grinding"

Negativ:
- An manchen Stellen zuviel "Grinding", dadurch zieht sich das Spiel in die Länge
- Phasen des Spiels wiederholen sich zu stark, dadurch kommt doch etwas Langeweile auf


Ich glaube dem Spiel hätte es gut getan, wenn es etwas kürzer gewesen wäre, denn gerade am Ende war ich einfach nur froh, dass ich die "Story" zu Ende gespielt hatte.

Ich empfehle es trotzdem an die Sorte Spieler, die gerne mal zwischendurch ein anderes Spiel erleben wollen und die wirklich keinen Anspruch auf Grafik haben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105463714', 'num_games_owned': 1339, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1465830290}
review:
好清新的像素类经营回合制RPG，瞬间回到小学玩GBA的时候有木有~

玩家可以选择5个角色，然后通过完成一个个任务来提升等级、技能和装备。适合每日游玩的游戏~

共有17个职业（貌似）可供选择，选择不同的人物有不同的属性，搭配适合职业的属性让角色更加犀利！

去酒馆可删除人物和重新排列人物顺序

roll点系统：
1、从一个地方travel到另一个地方，脸黑就遇怪了
2、野外露营居然会rool点，脸黑就遇怪了（我连续roll了两次1点真是报血警）
3、强化！这个真是坑！几率好低！强化三联爆！！！日了狗！知道来钱多不容易吗！

这游戏还能卡关！到一个任务就过不去了！BOSS战两边的法师怪又肉爆发又高，阿西吧

author: {'steamid': '76561198010993600', 'num_games_owned': 862, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1466692737}
review:
Hadn't played this game in a few months, decided to pick up where I left off, only to find that games' saves had been wiped in an update.

I recently wrote a negative review for a game that did this in early access.

This game is not in early access.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164699130', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 2681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2681, 'last_played': 1464895017}
review: Ottimo gioco di ruolo a turni in cui la strategia di gruppo è fondamentale per le battaglie più ostiche, ai livelli più alti spesso basta una sola mossa errata per mettere in crisi l'intero party, anche se bisogna precisare che nell'ultimo dungeon (dove si avrà a che fare sempre con gruppi di 5-6-7 nemici) e soprattutto con l'ultimo boss si dovrà sperare che questi utilizzino spesso gli attacchi più deboli. Ben riuscito lo stile grafico pixel-art, narrativa divertente e carine le musiche (anche se si contano sulle dita di una mano). Unico difetto qualche fastidiosa compenetrazione testuale. Gli achievement hunters si preparino ad almeno 15 ore di grinding per accumulare denaro.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064488881', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1601828313}
review:
Decent enough game that caused a sense of nostalgia. I come from the age of pen and paper RPGs, and this was why I purchased this game.

[List]
[*]Nice time waster
[*]Interesting taket on the old Pen and Paper RPGs
[*]Fills us old folks with nostalgia
[*]Will probably make you try to get your old gaming group back together
[*]Graphics are definitely better suited for a mobile device (but let's face it, you aren't in this for the graphics)
[/list]

I got this on sale (as most of us do with our games). Not sure about the $9.99 price tag, however. I can recommend this for a mobile device, as it is better suited for this type of game.

review:

 - *2°ora" cacchio, devo trovare la combinazione ideale di personaggi e abilità
 - *la trova e svolge ogni combattimento SEMPRE con lo stesso schema -> ci sono 3 abilità per personaggio*
 - *3°ora*  ok mi sono rotto le palle

author: {'steamid': '76561198057813685', 'num_games_owned': 1880, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 825, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 825, 'last_played': 1433457486}
review: 유저한글화가 된 게임입니다. TRPG 플레이의 보드 게임이랄까요. TRPG처럼 마스터와 플레이어가 둘러앉은 테이블이 있고 그 배경으로 내용이 펼쳐지는, 그런 RPG 게임입니다. 그래픽은 보잘 것 없고 유저 인터페이스도 꽤 불편하지만 게임의 방식과 스토리의 진행 등이 직관적이어서 꽤 재밌게 할 수 있습니다. 또 마스터와 플레이어들의 만담 아닌 만담도 제법 즐겁습니다.  스토리는 꽤 긴 편이고 캐릭터도 여럿이어서 즐길 거리는 적지 않습니다만, 이야기를 필요없이 늘리는 면도 있습니다.  중반 정도 가면 어차피 거기서 거기 라는 느낌을 받게 되고 노가다가 필요해서 지루해지기도 합니다. 그래도 초중반까지는 재밌게 할 수 있습니다. 후반이 고비. 스토리의 자유도는 제로. 분기가 있거나 하지 않습니다. 서브 퀘스트가 많아서 메인 퀘스트 도중도중에 서브 퀘스트를 즐길 수 있긴 합니다만 반복적입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091109160', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 681, 'last_played': 1451445116}
review:
At first, Knights of Pen and Paper was VERY fun. I enjoyed the little jabs the GM gave, I felt like I was being challenged fairly, it felt like I was playing a fun little tabletop. I even bought the Halloween DLC because I was having such a good time with it.

But then the challenges became SO exhausting. Toward the end it feels like you're just stuck in mud and can't progress no matter how high you level up. It stopped being fun and became a chore. If you enjoy grinding this game could be for you. 

Personally, not a big fan.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144592942', 'num_games_owned': 766, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 989, 'last_played': 1460576634}
review:
JOGO MUITO BOM

ainda não terminei de zerar, mas ja perdi 8 horas com esta belezinha que comprei por 3,99!

Tem várias referencias a atual cultura pop (coisas de filme, jogos, etc), e TEM O MITO, O DEUS, SACI PERERE

só por ter o FUCKING SACI, humor e tradução para portugues e outras língua voce ja deveria ter comprado

sobre o jogo, ele revive os rpg de mesa só que no seu pc, sistema de batalha por turnos, ''customização'' do seu grupo, vc escolhe que personagem (voce libera mais ao decorrer do jogo) vai ser que classe, e cada personagem tem uma skill passiva que o diferencia dos outros, tipo o bully com qualquer classe vai dar +1 de dano, o sr, john ganha 10% mais de experiencia,etc

Sobre a tradução, está muito boa e com algumas girias modernas brasileiras

Sobre a dlc(comprei por 2,99) ela adiciona a classe da bruxa, umas missões diferentes e uma nova localidade no mapa para vc explorar

EDIT: 15 horas jogando e nada de zerar ainda, vc chegará em uma parte que precisará farmar para poder passar, e a dlc ajuda muito para upar, recomendo compra-la para não ficar MUITO repetitivo

author: {'steamid': '76561198086060946', 'num_games_owned': 275, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1690482203}

author: {'steamid': '76561198023216972', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1441654175}
review:
First of all, there was an update that killed save files, which is a big problem for an RPG of this length.  I wasn't interested in replaying the first ten hours of the game, so I've never played it since then.  I'm not really sure what the developers were thinking.  It was an old game when the patch came out, so the loss of save files was definitely unexpected.

Also, it's pretty dumb that if you already have some of the DLC from buying the +1 Edition, you can't just buy the extra DLC you're missing without rebuying it with the base game.  Come on now.

As for the game itself, I would rate as so-so.  The theme and art is top-notch, but everything else becomes kind of a drag as you keep playing.  There's way too many boring encounters.  Some of the areas seem really poorly balanced-- I went into a dungeon with a level rating lower than my party's, and was basically insta-killed (had zero problems up to that point).  You might like it a little better than I did if you're a big fan of grindy RPGs, because there's a LOT of grinding.  What kept me playing was the witty writing, but it wasn't quite strong enough to carry the game on its own.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046058821', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2530, 'last_played': 1498617589}

author: {'steamid': '76561198119057120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 264, 'playtime_forever': 1114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1114, 'last_played': 1458410293}
review:
Overall this is a fun game with a few downsides.

Pros:
- graphics
- music
- references and jokes
- this is a long game
- character building (you can respec skills for small amount of gold)
- fights are fun
- game about playing a role-playing game
- insane and fun plot
- DLC is fair and square. It's a long, Halloween themed, series of quests.
- some classes are really powerful

Cons:
- some classes are relatively weak
- repetitive quests - that are fun nonetheless, due to amusing writing
- grinding gold and XP - you really need to grind a lot of gold and XP just to advance further
- upgrading weapons and armors takes too much gold
- some fights take too long to finish
- this game is mainly about fighting enemies
- the plot develops fully only after playing like about 10 hours into the game, before that one point it's mainly a fantasy parody
- you see those Space Invaders and school bullies in trailer? Good, you'll encounter them after about 10 hours of gameplay
- one bad decision during buying stuff or upgrading weapons/armor can result in a need to grind more gold for about half an hour

To be honest - I've had a blast of a time with this game. It was fun, jokes were really good, the plot was absolutely insane. 

I can recommend playing this game if you like parody games that have focus on battles. Drop it if you don't like too much fighting and grinding gold/xp on same enemies over and over again.

______
For anyone interested in joining in on completing your own backlog; check it out here - http://steamcommunity.com/groups/completingthebacklog/discussions/5/530645446320364338/

author: {'steamid': '76561198025700083', 'num_games_owned': 544, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1052, 'last_played': 1490992696}
review: There are Missingnos in this game! M.I.S.S.I.N.G.N.O.S!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198128398756', 'num_games_owned': 665, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2985, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2772, 'last_played': 1558784385}
review:
================================[h1] P O R T U G U Ê S [/h1]================================

Jogo muito divertido!!!!
Sem perceber dediquei 50h nesse jogo. É um verdadeiro simulador de RPG.

Prós:

+ Desenvolvido por brasileiros. BRASIL POHA!!!
+ Boa variedade de inimigos.
+ Cenários interessantes.
+ MUITAS referências.
+ Conquistas fáceis.

Contras:

- Quando se cria uma classe e aplica este a um personagem, caso você queira mudar de personagem, não tem como recuperar os pontos de habilidade da classe, ou seja, você terá que upar tudo novamente.
- Possui uma conquista muito CHATA: finalizar calabouço 50x (desnecessário).
- Não possui nuvem steam, MAS você pode se cadastrar in game no sistema da desenvolvedora e assim manter os seus saves.

Conclusão:

* O jogo passa um excelente e nostalgico clima retrô com seu layout pixelado.
* Quem possui amigos com seus mais de 27 anos de idade relembrará dos momentos de RPG de mesa graças as conversas entre os personagens e as referências espalhadas não apenas pelo ambiente mais também pelos próprios personagens.
* VALE MUITO COMPRAR ESSE JOGO!

================================[h1] E N G L I S H [/h1]================================

This game is so funny!!!!
I played for 50h, and I didn't notice the time going by. It's a true RPG Simulator.

Pros:

+ Brazilian developers. BRAZIL RULES!!!
+ Good variation of enemies.
+ Interesting scenarios.
+ It has too many references.
+ Easy achievements.

Cons:

- When you create a class and apply this to a some character, if you want change the character, you'll not be able to recover the skill points from this class, in other words, you'll have to up the skill points again.
- The game has a ANNOYING achievement: Finish a Dungeon 50x (unnecessary ¬¬').
- It doesn't have Steam Cloud, BUT you can create an account in game on the developers's system and then keep secure your progress.

Conclusion:

* The game shows an excellent and nostalgic retro climate with your pixelated layout.
* Who have many friends with more or less 27 years old will remember the moments when you played RPG board game. All this thanks the conversation between the characters, the references scattered on the scenarios and the character types too.
* Well BUY FAST THIS GAME!

author: {'steamid': '76561198065655605', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1065, 'last_played': 1674081029}
review:
I came into this game with relatively low expectations, and I am glad to say that KoPaP didn't disappoint.

There's plenty of replayability and the in-jokes here and there are appreciated, but what really pulls it together is that it's actually a pretty good representation of (albeit loosely) a tabletop RPG. There's not a ton of grinding involved, but when there /is/ grinding needed, you definitely feel it. That was probably the lowest point of the game that I experienced, and even then I kept going because there was still something waiting to be explored.
All in all, a very good game with a lot of untapped potential.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028719903', 'num_games_owned': 7606, 'num_reviews': 286, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 822, 'last_played': 1457737630}
review:
[h1]KoPP - виртуальный бумажный D'n'D[/h1]
Очень приятная игра, которая представляет себя как ролевую игру всяких чуваков, севших за столик поиграть в нечто вроде Dungeon and Dragons, то на свой лад. Скажем, что вышло очень хорошо, игра веселая и умеет развлекать того, кто в первую очередь (!) любит почитать тонны ролеплейных и \ или событийных описаний.
Это от того, что в игре всё удовольствие только от чтения на самом деле. В ней классно подаваемая история со смехотворными моментами в сюжете чуть ли не на каждом шагу. А ещё просто интересно.
Но ... это мобильная гриндилка с вырезанным донатом. И это чертовски угнетает. Ибо механика для гринда осталась.

Вы наверняка играли уже RPG, а лучше jRPG. Вы знаете, что в такие жанры можно играть с удовольствием, даже если есть гринд, когда вам есть что попробовать новое, или есть необходимость отточить навыки, билды персонажам или ещё что. Здесь от всего этого только видимость, ибо реальная необходимость - просто фармить лвлы, апгрейды вещей и сами вещи. А то, что доставляет основное удовольствие (сюжет и мирок) остается нередко на втором плане, хоть это и главное. Удовольствий от экспериментов или гринда здесь нет, надоедает.

В игре также есть кучи классов. Куча для старта + можно открыть потом. Честно сказать - это прибавляет интерес. Но потом вы понимаете, что каждый раз игра вас просто вынуждает качать новый класс, чтобы хотя бы прощупать его и понять как он ляжет в вашу пати. И, потратив время на кач с болью, вы убеждаетесь что класс пользы не принесет и выкидываете этого чара, заменяя старым или следующим новым. Что с этой механикой не так, черт подери? Она неприятная.

[h1]Почему можно купить игру:[/h1]
+ Вы очень чутки к каждой игре, поэтому готовы уделить ей много времени (а тут время ой как потребуется)
+ Вам нравится идеология ролевых игр. Как компьютерных, так и реальных настольных.
+ Если вы любите юмор. А здесь весь сюжет практически из него.
+ Не стоит бояться английского, т.к. есть руссификаторы всей той тонны текста, что вы можете почитать.
+ Собственно, если вы любите читать. Ибо основное удовольствие в сюжете, а сюжет только текстовый (олдскул прям :D)
+ Вас не страшит гринд (вынужденный фарм опыта и вещей) для достиежния определенных целей или ДАЖЕ для продвижений в сюжете (об этом упомяну ниже).
+ Классное пиксельное исполнение

[h1]Почему стоит пройти мимо:[/h1]
- Боевая система рано или поздно приедается. И очень сильно. Скучная боевка, которая максимум может быть интересной до лвла эдак 20, а далее вы уже не ощущаете большого профита от попыток изобрести что-то новое - результат примерно тот же всё равно остается....
- ... а ответ на результат один - фармите ещё. Да, следующий минус - гриндилка. Этот гринд уныл и скучен.
- Нет хоткеев или ещё чего-то. Я понимаю, что это порт с мобилок или просто мультиплатформа с тач скринов. Но нафармить 40 вещей одного типа и потом продавать поштучно. Вы издеваетесь?! Интерфейс для ПК убог как моя жизнь. Вы будете вынуждены всё обтыкивать мышкой и только.
- Чтобы изменить разрешение экрана на удобное для меня, мне пришлось лезть в реестр винды. ИиИ - Извращенство и Издевательство... над игроками.

[h1]Ещё ощущений[/h1]
Я дропнул игру. когда сюжетом меня заставило пойти в зону, которую я избегал из-за того. что она казалась слишком потной, а лвлы моей пати - неподходящими. И это сюжетная ветка даже, а не сторонняя, в итоге чтобы дальше двигаться по сюжету я мог либо гриндить, либо.... гриндить. Большой выбор, чтобы продвинуться дальше по сюжету, который только и приносил удовольствие, не так ли?

В итоге чтобы получить самое большое удовольствие от игры разрабы заставляют вас заниматься самым ненавистным делом. Это такой тонкий вид садизма.

[h1]Оценка: B+[/h1]
* я бы предпочёл дать со старта даже A+, но меня затошнило от всех этих огрехов, которые всё сильнее всплывали по ходу игры

author: {'steamid': '76561198006561118', 'num_games_owned': 644, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1442671860}
review:
"Jak powszechnie wiadomo RPG (akronim utworzony od "Rabować. Palić. Gwałcić.") jest to zdegenerowana "rozrywka", w ramach której Męskie Szowinistyczne Świnie™ gwałcą współgraczki... 

Errr.... Wróć. Jeszcze raz.

Jak nieco mniej powszechnie wiadomo RPG (akronim utworzony od "Role Playing Game", w języku polskim przyjęło się określenie "gra fabularna") jest to forma rozrywki, w ramach której gracze odgrywają (przede wszystkim przez opisywanie) działania wykreowanych przez siebie postaci, dokonując interakcji ze światem opisanym przez tzw. mistrza gry (z ang. "Game Master", "GM"; uczestnik zabawy pełniący m.in. funkcję arbitra, odpowiadający  za - i odgrywający - całe otoczenie graczy)."

"Tytuł jest ewidentnie adresowany do miłośników gatunku, weteranów RPG zarówno w odmianie table top (zwanej również pen and paper), jak i w wersji komputerowej. Jego największą siłą - ale też największą słabością - jest kreatywne granie z konwencją, zabawa kliszami i tropami, odniesieniami i nawiązaniami. Jest to zabieg o tyle ryzykowny (i stąd wynika ww. słabość), że odbiorca nie obeznany z gatunkiem i nie posiadający właściwego "kontekstu kulturowego" najzwyczajniej nie zrozumie wszystkich żartów i prędzej czy później znudzi się samą grą."

"Humor jest naprawdę wielką siłą tego tytułu - ale jest to humor specyficzny, zrozumiały przede wszystkim (a czasem - wyłącznie) dla wtajemniczonych. Nie mogę zatem polecić [b]KoP&P+1E[/b] każdemu bez wyjątku, ale jeśli znacie i lubicie RPGi - ten tytuł jest dla was, moi Szanowni P.T. Czytelnicy."

http://trollspodmostu.blogspot.com/2015/08/troll-gra-17-roll-for-initiative.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198132503739', 'num_games_owned': 599, 'num_reviews': 543, 'playtime_forever': 2010, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1930, 'last_played': 1590172346}
review:
Note that I write this review after i get the 100% completion, so the game is around 33.5 hours.

Knight of Pen and Paper is actually just a role playing game. By "role playing game", i didn't mean those RPG games when you fight monsters and explore lots of places. By "role playing game", I meant the more traditional RPG, when you act as a character, imagining that you are in a different place, and do whatever you want. There are battles, of course, as it's crucial to this game.

The first thing from this game that catches my eye is the art. I am a fond of pixel graphics games, and this one satisfy me. The pixels are made in a great detail. All of the assets are great looking, and the most important thing, there is no "recolored" monster at all (or i just didn't notice it), and fyi, there are tons of area to explore in this game, with different environments and monsters in most area. The music itself accompanies so well with the art, and i am never bored to listen it for long.

There are tons of characters that you can choose, and tons of classes to play with, creating a party for up to 5 people, Each character has their own advantages, and each class has their own roles (dps, support, healer, tanker). You can costumize each class to your own preference because their skills can be raised with skill point which is gained every level ups. Because of this, choosing your party member can be crucial, because you can finish the game quickly or slowly depends on your setup. Also, some classes and characters need to be unlocked first, which limits your choice even more on your first playthrough. If you want to do a 100% completion, i advise you to make multiple saves, because the gold carries on each save. You can have up to 3 save slots, and although the gold is carried between saves, the accessories, equipments and levels are not.

As for the battles, it's quite easy on the first part, and it becomes tougher and longer later on. You might need to grind a little or a lot depends on your setup, so make sure you get it right. Accessories also matters, because you can boost your characters quite well if you choose the right one. You can't really choose your equipments, but you can upgrade it with a success chance (well, don't worry because you can boost the chance to 100% if you have the money).


Pros:
- Tons of characters
- Tons of classes
- Tons of battles
- Almost none random encounters; you can set up your own battle
- Tons of maps
- Tons of stories and quests

Cons:
- Long battles
- Tons of grinding

Should you buy this game?
If you love to grind and doesn't mind with the long battles, buy it.
If you don't, then don't because it can be frustating.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056700771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 984, 'last_played': 1532379823}
review: Most addictive game ever! You'll get so involved with the story you won't realise it's 6 AM already.  Party customization is a lot of fun, the diffrent stats and personalities make each play through unique.  Classes are unique from each other, and work well in many diffrent combinations.   Got the DLC with the game as a holiday gift.  The DLC storyline is very, very funny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041319839', 'num_games_owned': 351, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1574, 'last_played': 1470583021}
review:
Ein wirklich schönes, witziges Spiel, wirkt es eher doch recht langweilig.

Man kann Knights of Pen and Paper sehr gut zwischendurch mal spielen oder aber auch etwas länger am Stück, aber leider ist die Story viel zu kurz und ich wage zu behaupten, dass man das Spiel schnell durch haben kann, wenn man es kennt. Es gibt jedoch auch sehr viele Sidequests die man erleidigen kann und es gibt sehr viele witzige, interessante Referenzen zur "Nerdkultur". 

Kein grafisches Meisterwerk, braucht es auch gar nicht sein. Es überzeugt mit klassischer Retrografik und rundenbasierten Kämpfen. Sicher nicht für jeden was, aber reinschauen empfehle ich jedem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106972613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1433949484}

author: {'steamid': '76561198277011659', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1071, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1071, 'last_played': 1456882313}
review: This is a great game all the way up until the end. Unfortunately the end is grind, grind and grind. I did every location 100% but had to start with recommended lvl40 fights when I was about lvl 33-34. When I was done with those I was around lvl39. And then the next quest is "kill the bad guy in this dungeon". I couldn't make it to the the boss because the boss lvl was 65. I realized that i would take hours of grind, and simply decided it wasn't worth it. I still got a great 17h from this game, so I'm still recommending it. Just wanted people to have a heads up. This game also doesn't babysit you with how you do things, most things you figure out by simply playing. Other than that this game had charming graphics, lots o references for the 90' kids. They offer a decent selection of classes to start with, but as you play this game you unlock more, up to 12 classes and 17 characters. all and all a great game but with, in my eyes one big flaw. 6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198092249044', 'num_games_owned': 147, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1690838088}
review:
This is the best RPG I have ever played. Totally worth it. I've played on the mobile version for hours, and I still believe I have many more to come. This is one of the only RPGs I know that has such replay value, especially since you can start over with new classes, and Gold is shared between your save files.

10 / 10. Perfect within its genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025459145', 'num_games_owned': 1911, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 971, 'last_played': 1456762929}
review:
優點：
一個人的D&D遊戲
職業選擇多，可自由搭配隊伍
可自由洗點，極少的死亡懲罰，可以輕鬆地遊玩

缺點：
任務故事有趣，但任務本身作業感重
後期難度陡升，DLC增加的道具與怪物應該是想銜接這部分，但是仍覺得不足


個人認為手機上表現較佳，遊戲本身非常適合瑣碎時間練個幾場
不過我手機上沒買DLC明顯中後期缺少了一點什麼，但的確是非必要
善用道具與隊伍安排一樣可以破關

author: {'steamid': '76561197980167683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 353, 'playtime_forever': 2083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2081, 'last_played': 1480833596}
review:
Шикарнейшая пародия на игру в настольные РПГ. Пародируется абсолютно всё, тут и настолки и квесты, и даже В. и У. Гейб с собственным паровым островом. Игра даже пародирует саму себя, выдавая несколько боёв с разработчиками игры и даже позволяя поиграть за них. Сюжет вольготно пинает штампы жанра и филигранно жонглирует восприятием реальности. Всё это очень смешно и интересно. Люди знакомые с настолками получат океан удовольствия, остальные - море. :)
Помимо собственно пародийности, интересных (хоть и типовых) квестов тут ещё и довольно сильная РПГ система с 13-ю классами (половину нужно открывать с помощью квестов), у каждого из которых четыре умения, которые прокачиваются 1 очком за уровень. Вроде простенько, но получается разнообразно и интересно.
Несмотря на свою "инди" направленность это довольно таки большая тактическая командная РПГ. 
Но есть и недостатки. Это ключные ачивки, которые вроде как глючили с момента релиза и так и не поправили. Например, у меня зависла ачивка на поиграть всеми классами на 12/13. Даже переустановка и новая игра (с открытием квестовых классов) не помогла. :(
Ну и главный недостаток - модная ныне пиксельная графика, не вызывающая у меня ничего, кроме ярости. Особенно на 27" мониторе без возможности как-то на разрешение повлиять. Во второй части с этим получше, но тут совсем всё печально.
Однако, это не помешало получить от игры массу удовольствия!
9/10

o jogo é divertido. 
dica pra quest dos 365 dias. 
faça apenas as com estrela no mapa"exceto a da dlc".
cuidado que tem uma estrela no mapa e outra pequena na escolha da quest"faça apenas essa e voce terminará o jogo entre 350 e 360 dias"eu terminei em 358 pois tive azar em encontrar a chave e ma sorte no dado"" faça apenas a quest com estrela e ignore as sem estrela.
So lembrando: tem uma estrela no mapa e outra na escolha da quest.
a com estrela é a missao principal.
a sem estrela é opcional "side quests".

review:
its a close call on this one it starts out good but it gets old fairly fast the classes of your party are set you get to pick the "race" but its just a minor trait the skills are unlocked in any order you choose but theres only 20 total 4 preset to each member of your party the quest system is fairly random with some story quests thrown in but they are all more or less the same other than some quest rewards there is verry little looot set up you end up buying most of the stuff in the store i still havent got a single new weapon
